title: 111_s3552
content: Directs the Secretary of the Air Force to: (1) conduct a study on the ability of the major air test and training range infrastructure to support the full spectrum of Air Force operations. (2) develop a master plan for requirements and proposed investments to meet Air Force training and test needs through 2025. And (3) submit to the congressional defense and appropriations committees an interim and final report on the master plan.
